entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
